name: Hecatomb (Kiba, "There is Light in the Darkness")
name_original: Hecatomb (Kiba, "There is Light in the Darkness")
description:
You wake up inside an old rotting cell, with nothing on you. You have no memories of your past, or why you're here but you do know one thing. You must escape at all costs, no matter the sacrifice you have to make... Will you succumb to the voices in your head and make it out alive?

A short game made by 2 slightly incompetent people for mini-jam 110. Sacrificing our own health counts too right?

Possible Planned Ideas for the Future:

  • More art, enemies, sounds, weapons.
  • Blood spells will be implemented.
  • Health system will be reworked to the original idea.
  • More maps and a few puzzles.

Controls

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

Left Click - Attack

E - Interact

Esc - Menu

Tab - Sacrifice Menu
